TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableCellCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableCellCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableCellCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableCellCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 物件的集合，這些物件表示 控制項中單一列的儲存格。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the cells in a single row of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別以程式設計方式管理的集合代表單一資料列中的儲存格的物件控制項。Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the cells of a single row in an control. 這個類別常用於加入、 移除或修改的資料列中的資料格的內容控制項。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a cell in a row of an control. > [!NOTE] > 控制項包含屬性，其中包含的集合物件。An control contains a property that contains a collection of objects. 每個物件都代表個別資料表中的資料列。Each object represents an individual row in the table. 物件包含屬性，表示集合的物件。An object contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 這些物件，代表資料列的個別儲存格。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of a row. 若要擷取個別的資料格，請先取得物件，代表包含資料表中的資料格的資料列 (從集合控制項)。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object that represents the row containing the cell in the table (from the collection of the control). 您可以取得物件，表示資料列中的資料格 (從集合物件)。You can then get the object that represents the cell in the row (from the collection of the object). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式產生的內容控制項加入儲存格集合。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding cells to an collection. 請注意，屬性所代表的是資料列，物件，是集合。Notice that the property of a row, represented by an object, is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell cell) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的 物件附加到 集合的結尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加入指定物件的結尾集合。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 如果您想要插入物件在集合中，使用指定的位置方法。If you want to insert an object in a specified location in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將附加的資料表，其所代表的資料格物件，結尾集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a cell of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 請注意，屬性所代表的資料列的物件是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 從 集合移除所有的 物件。

span.span: Removes all objects from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除所有物件從集合和重設屬性`0`。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會移除儲存格，從資料列，但它不會從資料表移除資料列。This method removes the cells from a row, but it does not remove the row from the table. 若要從資料表移除資料列，請確定同時移除物件，表示從資料列集合控制項。To remove a row from the table, be sure to also remove the object that represents the row from the collection of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除所有項目從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然後加入至集合並顯示在新的項目控制項。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/CS/htmltablecellcollectionclearcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/VB/htmltablecellcollectionclearvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the items from the collection to the specified , beginning with the specified index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法的內容複製集合配置到指定陣列的指定索引處開始。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified , starting at the specified index of the array. > [!NOTE] > `array`參數必須是以零為起始。The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來建立陣列，其中包含與相同的內容集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 陣列會逐一顯示的內容集合。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. summary.span: 取得 集合中 物件的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
The number of objects in the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷中所包含的資料格數目集合。Use the property to determine the number of cells contained in the collection. 屬性通常用於逐一查看集合以判斷右上繫結時。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料列中的資料格數目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of cells in a row of the control. 此值將做迴圈的上限來逐一查看資料表中的資料列的儲存格。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the cells of a row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/VB/htmltablecellcollectioncountvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 傳回 實作的物件，其中包含 集合中所有的 物件。

span.span: Returns a -implemented object that contains all objects in the collection.

returns.span: 實作的物件，包含 中所有的 物件。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立-實作可以逐一擷取的每個項目內容的物件集合。Use this method to create a -implemented object that can be iterated through to retrieve the contents of each item in the collection. 使用取得的項目目前的屬性指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，以將列舉值移至的初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必須呼叫方法，在建立之後-實作物件，或之後使用方法，以將列舉值移至集合中的第一個項目。The method must be called after creating the -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否則，項目會由未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來建立-實作物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a -implemented object. 物件會逐一顯示的內容集合。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionienumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionienumerator/CS/htmltablecellcollectionienumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionienumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionienumerator/VB/htmltablecellcollectionienumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性衍生自就會覆寫永遠傳回`false`表示存取集合經過同步化 （不安全執行緒）。This property is derived from and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that access to the collection is not synchronized (not thread safe). 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個索引子以取得物件從集合。Use this indexer to get an object from the collection. 您可以存取使用簡單陣列標記法的指定索引處的物件。You can access an object at a specified index by using simple array notation. > [!NOTE] > 集合是以零為起始。因此，集合中的第一個項目包含索引值`0`。The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用索引子來擷取資料表，其所代表的資料格物件，從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a cell of a table, represented by an object, from the collection. 以新的內容再更新資料格。The cell is then updated with new content. 請注意，屬性所代表的資料列的物件是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除指定物件從集合。Use this method to remove the specified object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定物件不存在於集合中，任何項目從集合中移除。If you specify an object that does not exist in the collection, no item is removed from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法中移除指定的儲存格在資料表所代表的物件，從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the specified cell of a table, represented by an object, from the collection. 這個範例會移除從第一個資料行的資料格控制項。This example removes the cells from the first column of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionRemove/CS/htmltablecellcollectionremovecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionRemove/VB/htmltablecellcollectionremovevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 從 集合中移除指定索引處的 物件。

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除從指定索引處的物件集合。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from an collection. 索引編號是以零為起始。因此，集合中的第一個項目具有索引值`0`。The index number is zero-based; therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的索引值範圍以外的索引時，會引發例外狀況。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除從指定索引處的項目集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 這個範例會移除從第一個資料行的資料格控制項。This example removes the cells from the first column of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionRemoveAt/CS/htmltablecellcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionRemoveAt/VB/htmltablecellcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的索引是位於集合的索引值範圍之外。

span.span: The specified index is outside the range of index values in the collection.
